sense.gloss: to talk back, to answer back, to retort, to reply, to respond
to say over, to repeat (what one has said)

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はいつも↑言↑↓|い↓い↑返↑↓かえ↓す|。
sdata.e: You always talk back to me, don't you?

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓に↑言↑↓|い↓い↑返↑↓かえ↓す|のは↑筋違↑↓すじちが↓いだ。
sdata.e: It's wrong of you to talk back to her.
